The PM's XI plays in Canberra tomorrow. Wish them luck against the English. It's certainly time for a victory! JG
9 measures for Thai people that I announced yesterday as part of the reform of Thailand. All measures will have metrics and timelines.
Thailand Reform Action Plan to Take Cabinet Tomorrow The goal of Thailand's reform is to create a fair and equal future for Thais.
Help is available for eligible people in affected areas who have lost their income as a direct result of the floods http://j.mp/dQuXHI JG
@shigawire Centrelink staff are working hard to help those hit by floods. Already over $10m has been paid in emergency assistance. JG
The Rutte cabinet has now started working for a few months. There are certain questions about government policy. #questionMP
Set your question to @MinPres Rutte now. At the end of this week he answers a few questions in a video. #questionMP
Read more about the government policy here: http://is.gd/ikA8V Direct your question to @MinPres and add the hashtag #vraagaanMP.
Epa my candangueros friends! With the bullet that killed EzequielZamora, they also killed the GranRevoluciónFederal! ZamoraVive !!
We had 117 schools converted into shelters. Today, 108 of them started classes. That is, 92.4%. Congratulations to all my team! To classes!
Queenslanders are coping with tragedy today and a growing flood crisis.  Our thoughts and sympathies are with them. JG
@KokodaKelly The people who deserve our praise are the amazing Aussies engaged in search & rescue, fighting the floods & relief work. JG
@ShaunGarrity Queenslanders will need our support for a long time. We will all be there for them as they face these sad & trying times. JG
Many questions came to @MinPres. Thanks for that! Thursday MP answers a few questions in a video. #questionMP
After yesterday's visit to Yemen we completed yesterday, Mehmet Niyazi's "Yemen Ah Yemen" sad story told in the book http://twitpic.com/3paohx
and I understand the feeling better today.
One of the most impressive aspects of my visit to Yemen is the careful preservation of the traces of Turkish existence http://twitpic.com/3paoze
was to see.
While many of our historical works were destroyed and the bricks were destroyed and destroyed, I was careful about the care they showed against the Turkish artifacts of the Yemeni people.
@magneme Agree with you. Many nice revues in Oslo. Read your review http://bit.ly/flyTks @dittOslo

Qlders are just amazing. I've been to 2 evac centers in Ipswich. They're full of volunteers & people smiling even in such tough times. JG
The Pastor of Ipswich Community Church evac centre told me he asked for blankets on facebook &160 turned up in a few hours - fantastic! JG
Curious about @MinPres's answers to your questions, watch the video here: http://is.gd/ksIQrK #questionspace
MP speaks about economics, higher education, energy policy, mortgage interest relief, the EU, Afghanistan, but also about his hobbies. #questionMP

The presidency accepted the resignation of the government and asked it to stay in caretaker capacity until a new government is formed

President Sleiman meets with Parliament Speaker Berri to set a date for the consultations with the Deputies
The consultations with the Deputies for the formation of a new government will start Monday January the 17th at 12 noon

It was a real privilege to meet the people of Grantham today. So much courage, so much hurt and so much to do to rebuild. JG

Congratulations to Russia's KAMAZ-Master team and Vladimir Chagin on their resounding victory in the Dakar Rally. Well done!
I always emphasize that the importance of education reform is to improve the quality of teachers. In the reform plan Thailand has a project to promote good teachers.
I wish to be cheerful and glorify the teachers who are dedicated to all of you. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qv43bUOX75w
@Kerryn20 Today I met people in Echuca. Local volunteers filled 35,000 sand bags. Rochester evacuees are trying hard to  keep on smiling. JG
President Sleiman postpones the Parliamentary consultations until next Monday
"After our appreciation for Arab leaders on their initiative, the primary responsibility to find the right solution lies on the Lebanese"
"There is no constitutional legitimacy for any authority that contradicts the pact of coexistence"
Congratulations Congratulations, our national team qualified for the second round of the Asian Nations Championship, and we hope to continue their successful match in the next game #GOJORDAN

Thailand Reform Action Plan 4 To follow up on this progress, I will call a working group meeting at least 2 times a week.
President Sleiman is in a meeting with the Turkish and Qatari foreign ministers in Baabda
Russia is loved in Palestine. It was good to get such a genuine welcome on the streets of the ancient city Jericho. This land needs peace.
Today I said thanks to some of our 1,885 Defence personnel working on Qld flood recovery. That's the biggest number since Cyclone Tracy. JG
@naehutch That's lovely! Say another big hi to your Uncle for me. JG
@malevolency Today I announced emergency payments & other assistance for Vics hit by floods. Helpline is 180 22 66. JG
